title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.54 - Classification of accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.54 - Classification of accounts

State Regulations
A list of accounts, systematically grouped (chart of
accounts), suitable for a particular organization, with descriptions setting
forth the meaning, function and content of each account and the relation of one
to another. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
